WLA.tutorial_00: Select the copper plates to reveal WINNING SYMBOLS.
WLA.tutorial_01: Select the shields to reveal YOUR SYMBOLS and their prize values.
WLA.tutorial_02: Find a WINNING SYMBOL that matches a YOUR SYMBOL to win the YOUR SYMBOL’s prize value.
WLA.tutorial_03: Find a jade multiplier after an arrow strikes a YOUR SYMBOL to win the YOUR SYMBOL’s multiplied prize value!

Commercial.tutorial_00: Select the copper plates to reveal WINNING SYMBOLS.
Commercial.tutorial_01: Select the shields to reveal YOUR SYMBOLS and their prize values.
Commercial.tutorial_02: If YOUR SYMBOL matches a WINNING SYMBOL, you win YOUR SYMBOL’s prize value.
Commercial.tutorial_03: If an arrow strikes YOUR SYMBOL and reveals a multiplier, your prize is multiplied!
